author: ghost
body:
# Summary of the new feature/enhancement

<!-- 
A clear and concise description of what the problem is that the new feature would solve.
Try formulating it in user story style (if applicable):
'As a user I want X so that Y.' with X being the being the action and Y being the value of the action.
-->

As a user, I experiment and figure out useful pipelines during a Powershell session. Often, I only realise the value of the session at its end. I would like to retroactively create a transcript, even though I didn't enter `Start-Transcript` at the beginning of the session.

comments.author: vexx32
comments.body: Not so much a _transcript_, but `Get-History` is already a thing, if that helps. :)

comments.author: ghost
comments.body: That will do it! Thank you.

title: Feature Idea: Retroactive Transcripts
